name: secret-family-recipes
description: API for the Secret Family Recipes Application

scripts.reset-h-stage: npx heroku run knex migrate:rollback -a ls-secret-family-recipes-stage && npx heroku run knex migrate:latest -a ls-secret-family-recipes-stage && npx heroku run knex seed:run -a ls-secret-family-recipes-stage
scripts.reset-h: npx heroku run knex migrate:rollback -a ls-secret-family-recipes && npx heroku run knex migrate:latest -a ls-secret-family-recipes && npx heroku run knex seed:run -a ls-secret-family-recipes

author: Dave Vazquez, Jamelle Boose
